title: What is the relationship between Jungkook and Lisa of BlackPink? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, there is nothing between Jungkook and Lisa from what I know. First of all, it SUPER annoys me when fans pinpoint the tiniest actions between Kpop idols and make it seem like they’re dating. Let me provide a few examples. “Oh, look! They bowed and smiled at each other! THEY’RE DATING!!!” “Hey, they both of matching colour coats! They’re in some sort of secret relationship!!!” Let me get this straight - I am not one of those jealous, obsessed fans who think that my ‘oppa’ should not be with anyone else but me. But come on, this is a bit much. Fans sometimes take just bowing and Kpop idols nodding in each other’s directions, and SOMEHOW turn them into ‘evidence’ that the two idols are dating. Any of the footage or evidence that you’ve seen so far only shows signs of common respect in Korea, nothing special. Honestly, if fans continue to do this, they’re just giving other fans reasons to shower hate on the idols and spread fake ass rumours. So far, Lizkook shippers are only taking polite claps, smiles, glances and small reactions to testify their claims. Lisa has never, ever mentioned Jungkook anywhere, and neither has Jungkook mentioned Lisa. Sorry if I sounded too rude back there. But no more words can just explain how ticked off I am at the fans who start spreading rumours about idols and creating fake news just to bring attention to themselves. Yes, you asked the question out of pure curiosity - and I am answering it. Nope, there is currently - quote unquote - nothing going on between Lisa and Jungkook.
